name: image-border-adder
title: Image Border Adder
description: Add black borders/frames to images (50px width)
content:
Overview

This application adds borders/frames to images. Built using Pillow with ImageOps.expand, it adds a 50-pixel black border around your images.

Features

  • Adds 50-pixel black border on all sides
  • Creates professional framed appearance
  • Maintains original image quality
  • Increases image dimensions by 100px in each direction

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a bordered image with the suffix _bordered in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Creating framed gallery images
  • Adding professional borders to photos
  • Preparing images for printing
  • Enhancing visual presentation
